svg.text: Zero overhead. Zero compromise. 100% Rust. 100% Agnostic. 8 pluggable traits.
No Pinecone, no Elasticsearch, no LangChain
Safe Reindex: rebuild FTS5 + re-embed missing vectors atomically | LIKE fallback | Upsert/Delete/Reindex
Setup Wizard -- afw onboard (quick default | --interactive for full wizard)
7 steps, under 60 seconds | Live connection testing | Secure defaults
Full summary: Provider, Model, Channels, Tunnel, Composio, Secrets, Gateway, Autonomy, Memory
~3.4MB binary | <10ms startup | 1,050 tests | 22+ providers | 8 traits | 18,900+ lines of Rust | 0 clippy warnings
